channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytipping - all sorts of rubbish, 9th December
item.description:
Flytipping - armchair, cupboards, boxes, metal frame and other rubbish. Please could it be removed. Thank you. Appeared evening of 8th December.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): The Vista, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox already reported to council since last week still there, 8th December
item.description:
A dead fox was reported to the council since last week. The kind resident who found it put it in a plastic bag and reported it to the council, and days later it hasn't been collected. It's a health hazard for all and it's unacceptable that the council hasn't yet picked it up. It'll soon start attracting vermin. It's unsanitary. It needs to be picked up urgently.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Abbey Wood Road, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside Sandwell Mansions, West End Lane NW6 1XL, 8th December
item.description:
(near Sumatra Road/West End Lane junction) Drain in roadway is blocked with what looks like impacted earth. Half the drain is blocked right up to the grille and the other half is blocked a little further down. This was reported and fixed some months ago, but the problem has occurred again.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Black Path, West Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins overflowing on Wilton road Not OK, 8th December
item.description:
This is a recurrent problem. Bins on Wilton road are again overflowing and there's rubbish all over the street. There's even vomit by one of the bins that's been partially washed by the rain. The fact the bins are overflowing is not ok. This is a busy street and it's not often cleared. It's unsanitary and not ok for residents.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Abbey Wood Road, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Household waste dumped again on Abbey Road, 8th December
item.description:
This is a hot spot and it is NOT OK for whoever keeps dumping their household waste. Photo was taken today at about 6pm. The day before it was clear. Outside #177 there's also a desk dumped outside and always has full bins overflowing. Cameras are needed to catch the right people and stop this from recurring.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Abbey Wood Road, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The road is used for long term parking, 8th December
item.description:
Cars and commercial vehicles park in Thorpewood Avenue for days, weeks, without moving. This means residents often have to park some distance from their home, they are sometimes parked so that they obstruct visibility. This has got noticeably worse this year since the building development on Sydenham HIll, which I believe has no parking?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Thorpewood Avenue, Forest Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 8th December
item.description:
There has been rubbish fly tipped on corner of Albury st and Mary Ann gardens for some weeks, could you please clear

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mary Ann Gardens, Deptford, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside Orientalist / 4 Qubes, 8th December
item.description:
Very large and deep pothole, difficult to see in the dark, and just before turning onto Lady Somerset Road. Genuine hazard and currently causing significant issues and already has lead to injuries to cyclists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 53-79, Highgate Road, Kentish Town, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poor workmanship, 8th December
item.description:
After felling a dead tree outside 2 Balchier Road, the council recently “fixed” the pavement. However, it’s been poorly done and is a trip hazard

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Balchier Road, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pothole almost cracked my wheel, 8th December
item.description:
There is a huge pothole just after the zebra crossing in a blind spot, I have smashed my car wheel there twice now and it needs to be addressed urgently. I have a 4x4 if I was a cyclist or a motorcyclist I would have injured myself.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Salusbury Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Lights still not working in the park
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Ridge Close, Thamesmead

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lansdowne Road, Plaistow, Greater London

item.category: Utility Works and Temporary Traffic Lights

item.title: Thurlow Hill SE21 yellow plastic Lambeth grit bin, 8th December
item.description:
Thurlow Hill SE21 yellow plastic Lambeth grit bin next to house number 74 / opposite side of the road to Lambeth streetlight ID number 9. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture and Google Streeview link. https://www.google.com/maps/place/82+Thurlow+Hill,+Norwood,+London+SE21+8JN/@51.4415233,-0.1010623,3a,75y,59.66h,79.02t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1snp9oaqgLWgRX3rot3VLoDA!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D10.981155469411505%26panoid%3Dnp9oaqgLWgRX3rot3VLoDA%26yaw%3D59.659362867233746!7i16384!8i8192!4m6!3m5!1s0x4876040f61c61935:0x146f51eadbff3295!8m2!3d51.4414757!4d-0.101254!16s%2Fg%2F11n06wpkfh?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MTIwMi4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thurlow Hill, Tulse Hill, Greater London

item.title: VRM - SP14VNS flytipping, 8th December
item.description:
This vrm SP14VNS has been seen fly tipping in the spinel court communal bin area. A neighbour caught them and when questioned they claimed to live at flat 16 which is a lie as that is my flat. Can you come and remove all the dumped items that this scum bag has left please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Richmer Road, Slade Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: At top right of Carlingford Road, close to the junction of Willoughby, 8th December
item.description:
The concrete wall below the wooden fence is leaning and cracked. If it suddenly fails, which appears very possible, it could cause serious injury to passers by.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Carlingford Road, Belsize Park, Greater London
